answer2_2: At the spa or with a massage
desc: Answer these questions in less than a minute.
question1: What is the main reason for your visit?
question2: How do you prefer to relax during your stay?
question3: How would you rate your experience at the hotel so far?
question4: Is there anything specific we can do to improve your stay?
question5: Do you have any general comments or suggestions about your experience with us?
title: Your opinion helps us improve your experience.
